name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Reckless One
text:
Parallel die Anakin Skywalker ([CM]53).
After you activate this character, deal 1 damage to him and 2 damage to another character. Then, if that character was just defeated, flip this character.

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Driven By Anger
text: Parallel die Darth Vader ([AW]10). Power Action - Either remove all shields from a character, or resolve one of your dice as melee damage, increasing its value by 1. If an opponent has a defeated character, you may do both in any order.

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Seeking The Path
text:
Parallel die Luke Skywalker ([LEG]31).
Team Up 1: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Yoda.
After the upkeep phase begins, if this character has 3 or more shields and 3 or more Blue upgrades with dice, you may spend 2 resources to flip him.

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Fulfilling His Destiny
text: Parallel die Luke Skywalker ([AW]35). Power Action - Either give this character 2 shields, or remove 2 shields from him to deal 2 damage to a character. If this character has 3 or more Blue upgrades, you may do both in any order.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Wise Protector
text: Guardian. After this character is defeated, return him to play flipped and ready. Action - Spot another Blue character to remove a die showing damage. Defeat this character and, if he is elite, remove up to 3 dice.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Spirit
text: Parallel die One With the Force ([AW]42). If this support would leave play, set it aside instead. Power Action - Give a Blue character 1 shield and reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.

name: Sweeper Droid Infiltration
text: After setup, if this plot is elite, add an additional copy of it to your team. Action - Play an event from your hand to reroll a die. Then flip this plot.

name: Demolition Droid
text: Action - Play a non-event card from your hand to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. If 2 or more bomb plots are in play, you may set them all aside and deal 4 indirect damage to an opponent. If you do not, flip this plot.

name: Send in the Troopers
text: Action - If you control the battlefield and 5 or more dice in your pool are showing damage, force an opponent to name a character. Then flip this plot. If they did not name this character, make it elite.

name: Arc Trooper Echo
subtitle: Courageous and Resolute
text: After you activate this character, if it is elite, you may roll a character die on a character into its controler's pool. If you control the battlefield, you may roll a character die on a character into its controller's pool.

name: Arc Trooper Fives
subtitle: ARC-5555
text:
After you activate this character, roll a Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) die into your pool, or 2 Clone Trooper dice instead if this character is elite.
After a Clone Trooper die is rolled into your pool, you may reroll it. If you control the battlefield, you may reroll it again.

name: Clone Commander Wolffe
subtitle: Staunch Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may roll a Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) die into your pool and activate one of your Red characters. If this character is elite and you control the battlefield, spot any number of unique Red characters to deal that much indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Closing In
text: Team Up 1: Each unique bounty hunter. After you deal melee or ranged damage to a character with a bounty on it, you may exhaust this plot and flip it to attach it to that character.

name: Captured
text: If this downgrade would leave play, set it aside instead. Attached character cannot be activated. Action - Give the player that controls this downgrade 1 resource to flip it. Any player may use this ability.

name: Rescue Han Solo
text: Team Up 1: Chewbacca, Lando Calrissian, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker. Action - Play a card from your hand with a cost equal to the number of resources on this plot. Its cost cannot be decreased. Then place 1 resource on this plot and if it has 5 resources, flip it and exhaust it.

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Cool and Confident
text:
Piloting. Parallel die Han Solo ([AW]46).
After you activate this character, remove 1 resource from him to gain 1 resource.
After this character is defeated, lose all of your resources. Each opponent gains that many resources.

name: Choose Your Destiny
text:
Infinite format only. Choose 3 sets. You can only include other cards on your team and in your deck from those sets.
After you play a card, if you played cards from all 3 sets this round, flip this plot.

name: I Will Not Turn
text:
Your dice cannot be turned by opponents.
Before the round ends, gain 1 resource.
After an opponent plays a card, if they played cards from 3 different sets this round, flip this plot.

name: United
text:
Include only if each character on your team is the same color.
After an opponent removes one of your dice, you may roll it into your pool. Then set this plot aside, or if it's elite, flip it instead.

name: We Stand
text: After an opponent removes one of your character dice, you may spend 2 resources and discard 2 cards from your hand to ready that character. Then set this plot aside.

name: Mortis (Day)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, heal 1 damage from each character. Flip this card. Claim - Heal 1 damage from a character. You may flip this card.

name: Mortis (Night)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 1 damage to each character. Flip this card. Claim - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may flip this card.
